From the Four Seasons Mod.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Sets the most probable Severity. The higher the value, the worse the negative effects, basically setting the difficulty. 3 is recommended for balance reasons.
From the Four Seasons Mod.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If enabled, Winter can have a Severity of 6. Disabled is recommended as Severity 6 can take a lot of dynamic and fun out of the game.
Time of Day based on Season

From the Four Seasons Mod.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]If enabled, the mod changes the Animated Time of Day based on the current Season. Enabled is recommended to improve the immersion of the Season.[NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Once the game started, deactivate 'Animated Time of Day' in the options to make this work properly.
